date.headline: wevolver
date.text:
Wevolver aims to be a social networking and collaborating platform for the Open Hardware/Design projects.

We have built the project technically from top to bottom(except design), creating complex visualizations with the d3 library and a smooth user experience with AngularJS.

http://app.wevolver.net
date.description: Wevolver aims to be a social networking and collaborating platform for the Open Hardware/Design projects.
date.tech: python, django, angularjs, d3js, google drive API
date.contribution: We have built the project technically from top to bottom(except design), creating complex visualizations with the d3 library and a smooth user experience with AngularJS.

date.headline: selltag
date.text:
Selltag is a social network to sell physical/digital stuff. It's fully connected with the social networks so you could sell to the people you trust.

Creation of the technical arquitecture of the application, development of part of the backend using Symfony 2 and development of the more complex Javascript parts in the app using AngularJS.

http://selltag.com
date.description: Selltag is a social network to sell physical/digital stuff. It's fully connected with the social networks so you could sell to the people you trust.
date.tech: php, symfony 2, angularjs, facebook API, Twitter API
date.contribution: Creation of the technical arquitecture of the application, development of part of the backend using Symfony 2 and development of the more complex Javascript parts in the app using AngularJS.
